name: In the darkness (rollcreators)
description:
Find treasures in the dark water deep!

Controller

WASD - move

Shoot - Left Mouse Button

Space - turn off/on light

Destroy leads to get more resources

Credits

Team: RollCreators

- Game designer and artist: Andrey Elisafenko

- Developer: Vyacheslav Zhuravlev

- Sound designer: Sergey Gushin
